STATEMENT.name: SELECT_CHECKED_OBJECT_LIST
STATEMENT.query: SELECT SUB_RPT_ID AS OBJ_ID FROM SBI_SUBREPORTS WHERE MASTER_RPT_ID = ?

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_LIST_ENGINE
STATEMENT.query: SELECT E.ENGINE_ID AS ID, E.DESCR AS DESCRIPTION, E.NAME AS NAME, E.LABEL AS LABEL FROM SBI_ENGINES E

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_LIST_PARAMETERS
STATEMENT.query: SELECT P.PAR_ID AS ID, P.DESCR AS DESCR, P.LENGTH AS LENGTH, P.LABEL AS LABEL, P.NAME AS NAME, P.PAR_TYPE_CD AS TYPE, P.MASK AS MASK, P.PAR_TYPE_ID AS TYPE_ID, COUNT(DISTINCT(U.USE_ID)) as NUM_USES, COUNT(DISTINCT(O.BIOBJ_ID)) as NUM_BIOBJECTS FROM SBI_PARAMETERS P LEFT JOIN SBI_PARUSE U ON U.PAR_ID = P.PAR_ID LEFT JOIN SBI_OBJ_PAR O ON O.PAR_ID = P.PAR_ID group by P.PAR_ID, P.DESCR, P.LENGTH,P.LABEL,P.NAME,P.PAR_TYPE_CD,P.MASK, P.PAR_TYPE_ID

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_LIST_MODALITIES_VALUE
STATEMENT.query: SELECT T.LOV_ID AS ID, T.LABEL AS LABEL, T.NAME AS NAME, T.DESCR AS DESCR, T.INPUT_TYPE_CD AS TYPE, COUNT(DISTINCT(P.PAR_ID)) AS N_OF_PARAMETERS FROM SBI_LOV T LEFT JOIN SBI_PARUSE P ON T.LOV_ID=P.LOV_ID GROUP BY T.LOV_ID,T.LABEL,T.LABEL, T.NAME,T.DESCR,T.INPUT_TYPE_CD

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_BIOBJECT_VALUE
STATEMENT.query: SELECT BI.BIOBJ_ID AS ID,BI.LABEL AS LABEL, BI.NAME AS NAME, BI.DESCR AS DESCR, E.NAME AS ENGINE FROM SBI_OBJECTS BI, SBI_ENGINES E WHERE BI.ENGINE_ID=E.ENGINE_ID

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_PARAMETERS_LIST
STATEMENT.query: SELECT PAR_ID AS PAR_ID, LABEL AS LABEL, NAME AS NAME, DESCR AS DESCRIPTION, PAR_TYPE_CD AS TYPE FROM SBI_PARAMETERS

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_REPORTS_LIST
STATEMENT.query: SELECT BIOBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID, DESCR AS DESCRIPTION, LABEL AS LABEL, NAME AS NAME FROM SBI_OBJECTS

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_PREDEFINED_CHECKS
STATEMENT.query: SELECT T.CHECK_ID AS ID, T.LABEL AS LABEL, T.NAME AS NAME, T.DESCR AS DESCRIPTION, T.VALUE_TYPE_CD AS CONTROLTYPE FROM SBI_CHECKS T, SBI_DOMAINS D WHERE D.DOMAIN_CD='PRED_CHECK' AND T.VALUE_TYPE_CD = D.VALUE_CD

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_LIST_MODALITIES_CHECKS
STATEMENT.query: SELECT T.CHECK_ID AS ID, T.LABEL AS LABEL, T.NAME AS NAME, T.DESCR AS DESCRIPTION, T.VALUE_TYPE_CD AS CONTROLTYPE FROM SBI_CHECKS T, SBI_DOMAINS D WHERE D.DOMAIN_CD='CHECK' AND T.VALUE_TYPE_CD = D.VALUE_CD

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_ALL_DS
STATEMENT.query: SELECT DS_ID as ID, DESCR, LABEL, JNDI, URL_CONNECTION, USERNAME, PWD, DRIVER FROM SBI_DATA_SOURCE

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_ALL_DATASET
STATEMENT.query: SELECT S.DS_ID as ID, S.DESCR, S.LABEL, S.NAME, COUNT(O.BIOBJ_ID) as NUM_BIOBJECTS FROM SBI_DATA_SET S LEFT OUTER JOIN SBI_OBJECTS O ON O.DATA_SET_ID=S.DS_ID GROUP BY S.DS_ID,S.DESCR, S.LABEL, S.NAME

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_ALL_DL
STATEMENT.query: SELECT SDL.DL_ID as ID, SDL.NAME, SDL.DESCR, COUNT(SDLU.DLU_ID) as USERS FROM SBI_DIST_LIST SDL LEFT OUTER JOIN SBI_DIST_LIST_USER SDLU ON SDL.DL_ID = SDLU.LIST_ID GROUP BY SDL.DL_ID,SDL.NAME,SDL.DESCR

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_ALL_DL_USER
STATEMENT.query: SELECT s.NAME, s.DESCR, s.DL_ID as ID, 1 as PRES FROM SBI_DIST_LIST s, SBI_DIST_LIST_USER sbu, SBI_DIST_LIST_OBJECTS o, SBI_OBJ_FUNC sof, SBI_FUNC_ROLE fr, SBI_EXT_ROLES e WHERE s.DL_ID = o.DL_ID AND sbu.LIST_ID=s.DL_ID AND o.DOC_ID = sof.BIOBJ_ID AND sof.FUNCT_ID = fr.FUNCT_ID AND fr.STATE_CD = 'EXECUTION' AND fr.ROLE_ID= e.EXT_ROLE_ID AND e.NAME IN (?,?,?,?,?,?) AND sbu.USER_ID = ? GROUP BY s.NAME, s.DESCR, s.DL_ID union SELECT s.NAME, s.DESCR, s.DL_ID as ID, 0 as PRES FROM SBI_DIST_LIST s, SBI_DIST_LIST_OBJECTS o,SBI_OBJ_FUNC sof,SBI_FUNC_ROLE fr, SBI_EXT_ROLES e WHERE s.DL_ID = o.DL_ID AND o.DOC_ID = sof.BIOBJ_ID AND sof.FUNCT_ID = fr.FUNCT_ID AND fr.STATE_CD = 'EXECUTION' AND fr.ROLE_ID= e.EXT_ROLE_ID AND e.NAME IN (?,?,?,?,?,?) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT sl.DL_ID FROM SBI_DIST_LIST sl, SBI_DIST_LIST_USER sbul, SBI_DIST_LIST_OBJECTS ol,SBI_OBJ_FUNC ofl,SBI_FUNC_ROLE frl, SBI_EXT_ROLES el WHERE sl.DL_ID = ol.DL_ID AND sbul.LIST_ID=sl.DL_ID AND ol.DOC_ID = ofl.BIOBJ_ID AND ofl.FUNCT_ID = frl.FUNCT_ID AND frl.STATE_CD = 'EXECUTION' AND frl.ROLE_ID= el.EXT_ROLE_ID AND el.NAME IN (?,?,?,?,?,?) AND sbul.USER_ID = ? AND s.DL_ID = sl.DL_ID) GROUP BY s.NAME, s.DESCR, s.DL_ID

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_ALL_OBJMETADATA
STATEMENT.query: SELECT M.OBJ_META_ID AS ID, M.DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, M.LABEL, M.NAME, D.VALUE_NM AS TYPE, COUNT(C.BIOBJ_ID) as NUM_OBJ, COUNT(C.SUBOBJ_ID) as NUM_SUBOBJ FROM SBI_OBJ_METADATA M LEFT OUTER JOIN SBI_OBJ_METACONTENTS C ON C.OBJMETA_ID=M.OBJ_META_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SBI_DOMAINS D ON M.DATA_TYPE_ID=D.VALUE_ID GROUP BY M.OBJ_META_ID , M.DESCRIPTION, M.LABEL, M.NAME, D.VALUE_NM
